name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Official media released photos of Xi Jinping at the Third Plenary Session of the 18th CPC Central Committee

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Douyin users once again began to miss Li Keqiang

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In Xiangyang, Hubei, a mother reported her husband, Shu Hua, director of the Xiangyang Nanzhang Branch of China Telecom Hubei Transmission Bureau, for killing her newborn child.
The mother said that her husband threatened her son to ask for her pre-marital property, and then her son died mysteriously on July 13. She also said that the police have not filed a case since she reported the case.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens have received a notice that the Human Rights Development and Exchange Center of the Publicity Department of the CPC Central Committee is now looking for travel bloggers and influencers in China to go to Tibet to shoot cultural landscapes and arrange content, and requires bloggers to have overseas platform accounts.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Today's hot search "my country has built the world's largest education system" triggered complaints from netizens

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Late in the night of July 18, a male student from the School of Pharmacy at the Chashan Campus of Wenzhou Medical University jumped off a building because he was unable to graduate. The school then adopted a policy of covering one's mouth, which prompted his classmates to speak out on Xiaohongshu.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 19 (Released) Guangdong Lufeng. Netizens claimed that the security guard of Lufeng Weicai Kindergarten molested multiple children. "A girl was found bleeding from her lower body" The kindergarten said: We are cooperating with the police investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 19, a doctor was hacked to death at the First Affiliated Hospital of Wenzhou Medical University.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 18-19, a fire at a department store in Zigong, Sichuan, killed 16 people. Citizens spontaneously laid flowers next to the Jiuding Building to mourn.
A flower shop owner posted bad comments in a WeChat group, and strangers threw money for the dead at the door of the flower shop.
https://t.co/PZJcsNkFKB

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a woman in Nanchong, Sichuan, posted a video with her real name to report that her parents-in-law had a huge amount of unknown assets, which attracted public attention. The woman said that her father-in-law was the director of the Price Supervision and Inspection Branch of the Nanchong Affairs Bureau, and her mother-in-law was the director of the Financial Planning Department of the Nanchong Branch of the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China. The two had assets worth nearly 100 million yuan, including 8 shops and 3 houses.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 18, Henan. After an elderly man in a wheelchair fell down, no one around dared to help him. The elderly man begged passers-by to help him up. Finally, an enthusiastic woman found someone to help and called 120. The woman said that some people said she was meddling in other people's business, but she would feel guilty if she didn't help.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A Wuhan woman said: Her brother was admitted to the ICU to save others, and the mother and child who fell into the water did not show up.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Police Report

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a netizen posted a video saying that the director of the Second People's Hospital of Longhu District, Shantou, and his wife had been committing adultery for a long time and were caught on the spot. His wife is also the vice chairman of the Marriage and Family Happiness Construction Association and was threatened by the other party afterwards.
On July 18, the Health Bureau of Longhu District, Shantou City responded: We have received relevant information and have set up a special team to resolve the matter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a netizen posted a video saying that "a large truck passed through Zhangleng Village in Zanhuang County, Hebei Province, causing great safety hazards to local villagers." After the video was released, the local public opinion response department collectively complained about the video in an "assessment-style" manner. 
After searching, it was found that recently some villagers reported on the People's Daily leadership message board that heavy trucks have been entering and leaving Zhangleng Village for several days, and the speed is fast, which is very dangerous, and asked the leaders to help solve the problem.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: CPC Central Committee: China's economic recovery is not strong enough

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 18, Beijing. Lawyer Chen posted a video saying, "Has the winter of the lawyer market really come?" The revenue in June was zero, and no case was received in the whole month of June. Later, the lawyer uploaded another video, which showed that there were 9 law firms on one street. In response, Lawyer Chen said: The golden age of the legal industry has passed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to Nhan Dan, the official newspaper of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam, General Secretary of the Communist Party of Vietnam Nguyen Phu Trong passed away at 13:38 today (July 19).

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 19 (report)
